disclaimer: LLM's can make mistakes. Check the information provided by them.

prompts.text: Help me write a blog post
Create a presentation on AI and ML
Write code for a web application

errors.NetworkError: A network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.AbortedError: The request was aborted. If you want to continue, click on the continue button or write a new message.
errors.default: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.ollamaOriginError: Ollama is not accessible from the current origin. Please check the CORS.
errors.ollamaConnectionError: Ollama is not connected. Please check your base URL and try again. If you don't use dedicated server, verify you have installed Ollama on your local machine.

completionTokens.label: Completion tokens
completionTokens.tooltip: The number of tokens the model has generated.

promptTokens.label: Prompt tokens
promptTokens.tooltip: The number of tokens in the prompt.

totalTokens.label: Total tokens
totalTokens.tooltip: The total number of tokens (prompt + completion).

waitTime.label: Wait time
waitTime.tooltip: The time it took to connect to the model and start generating a response.

responseTime.label: Response time
responseTime.tooltip: The time it took to generate the response.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Select the theme for the extension.

language.label: Interface Language
language.description: Select a language for the extension.

ollama.title: Ollama
ollama.description: Ollama is a powerful AI tool that allows you to run LLM models on your own machine.
ollama.corsTopic: Set Up Cross-Origin Access for Ollama to work properly. Follow the <Link>guide</Link> if you are not setup it yet.
ollama.modelsLocationTopic: If you are using Ollama on your local machine and want to change where models are stored, you can do so by following <Link>this guide</Link>.

baseURL.label: Base URL
baseURL.description: By default, the base URL is set to http://127.0.0.1:11434. If you have a dedicated server, you can change the base URL here.

ollama.connected: Connection with Ollama server established successfully
ollama.disconnected: Connection with Ollama server is not established
ollama.baseURLChanged: Base URL has been changed successfully
ollama.modelDeleted: Model {{ name }} has been deleted successfully
ollama.modelPulled: Model {{ name }} has been pulled successfully and will be available in the models list at once

groq.title: Groq
groq.description: Use groq models to generate responses. Use your API key to get started.

lmStudio.title: LM Studio
lmStudio.description: Use LM Studio models to generate responses. Use your API key to get started.

aimlapi.title: AI/ML API
aimlapi.description: Generate AI responses with AI/ML. Use your API key to get started.

openai.title: OpenAI
openai.description: Generate AI responses with OpenAI. Use your API key to get started.

anthropic.title: Anthropic
anthropic.description: Generate AI responses with Anthropic. Use your API key to get started.
